author: vors
body:
WIP for #559, **don't merge**
Request for review from @lzybkr and @BrucePay 
- replace "agregate input" by "incremental input" in NativeCommandProcessor
- 'ping | grep' scenario works as expected (no buffering)

Known issues:
- 'ping | grep --line-buffered | grep' scenario still doesn't work as expected.
- inputWriter thread spins, while waiting for new input,
  need to replace it by proper async.
- we need a new algorithm to calculate redirectInput.
  The old one relaied on the fact that all input is available at this moment.
- Test "Host / ConsoleHost.Tests.ps1 / Pipe to/from powershell / text input" hangs.
title: Improve pipeline for native commands (WIP)
